model package¶

Submodules¶

model.evaluate_model module¶

class model.evaluate_model.SummarizationMetrics(tokenizer)¶

Bases: object

model.evaluate_model.classification_compute_metric(eval_preds)¶

Method for use in model training to evaluation performance. Includes accuracy, F1 (micro & macro), precision, recall, hamming loss and ROC-AUC (micro & macro)

Parameters:

eval_preds (transformers.EvalPrediction) – logits and labels for computing metrics

Returns:

float]: metrics based on evaluations

Return type:

dict[str

model.evaluate_model.intent_compute_metrics(eva_pred)¶

Method for use in model training to evaluation performance. Includes accuracy.

Parameters:

eval_preds (transformers.EvalPrediction) – logits and labels for computing metrics

Returns:

float]: metrics based on evaluations

Return type:

dict[str

model.model_inference module¶

Script for running inference based on saved model weights. Used for both classification and summarization.

model.model_inference.classification_prediction(text: str) → list[str]¶

Takes clinical note input and makes predictions of possible ICD-10 code labels using fine-tuned classification LLM.

Parameters:

text (str) – Text to classify

Returns:

predicted ICD-10 codes in list format

Return type:

list[str]

model.model_inference.intent_prediction(text: str) → str¶

Takes clinical note w/ intent for either classification or summarization and predicts intent.

Parameters:

text (str) – Clinical note to infer intent.

Returns:

Intent label (classification or summarization currently)

Return type:

str

model.model_inference.model_routing_pipeline(texts: list[str]) → None¶

Takes text or list of texts through pipeline. Intent prediction -> either classification or summarization -> output

Parameters:

list[str] (texts) – text(s) to feed into pipeline and return either associated ICD-10 codes (classification) or a summary of the clinical note (summarization).

Returns:

None

model.model_inference.summarization_prediction(text: str) → str¶

Takes clinical note input and returns a summary using the fine-tune summarization LLM.

Parameters:

text (str) – Clinical note text to summarize

Returns:

Summary of clinical note

Return type:

str

model.train_model module¶

Module to set up training tasks for all NLP models.

model.train_model.classification_model_training(data_dir: str, label_dir: str, checkpoint: str, save_dir: str, training_checkpoint_dir: str, test_data_dir: str) → None¶

Training method for fine-tuning a pre-trained encoder model on ICD-10 code classification task.

Parameters:

  • data_dir (str) – path to dataset being used for training

  • label_dir (str) – path to labels

  • checkpoint (str) – pre-trained HuggingFace model used for training

  • training_checkpoint_dir (str) – directory to save in-training model config

  • save_dir (str) – path to saved PEFT weights for specified task

  • test_data_dir (str) – path to save test data to

Returns:

None

model.train_model.compute_pos_weight(dataset: Dataset) → Tensor¶

Function to calculate positive class weight for classification pipeline. Intended to help with class imbalance by increasing the penalty of positive labels.

Parameters:

dataset (Dataset) – HuggingFace dataset with a “labels” columm. Labels are expected to contain multi-hot vectors

Returns:

tensor of positive class weight for each class

Return type:

Tensor

model.train_model.intent_model_training(data_dir: str, checkpoint: str, save_dir: str, training_checkpoint_dir: str) → None¶

Training pipeline for intent targeting (between classification and summarization for now).

Parameters:

  • data_dir (str) – path to dataset being used for training

  • checkpoint (str) – pre-trained HuggingFace model used for training

  • save_dir (str) – path to saved PEFT weights for specified task

  • training_checkpoint_dir (str) – directory to save in-training model config

Returns:

None

model.train_model.summarization_model_training(data_dir: str, checkpoint: str, save_dir: str, training_checkpoint_dir: str, test_data_dir: str) → None¶

Training method for fine-tuning a pre-trained encoder-decoder model on clinical note summarization task.

Parameters:

  • data_dir (str) – path to dataset being used for training

  • checkpoint (str) – pre-trained HuggingFace model used for training

  • training_checkpoint_dir (str) – directory to save in-training model config

  • save_dir (str) – path to saved PEFT weights for specified task

  • test_data_dir (str) – path to save test data to

Returns:

None

Multi-model Biomedical LLM
